system_architecture.scaling_approach: Horizontal auto-scaling with predictive load balancing

data_flow.ingestion: Real-time video/audio streams, IoT sensor data, external intelligence feeds
data_flow.processing: Distributed across edge nodes, local servers, and cloud instances
data_flow.storage: Multi-tier (hot/warm/cold) with vector embeddings and time-series data
data_flow.output: Real-time alerts, dashboards, API responses, and automated actions

compute_infrastructure.edge_devices: NVIDIA Jetson Xavier NX, Intel Neural Compute Stick

databases.vector_db: Milvus/Qdrant for embeddings and similarity search
databases.time_series: InfluxDB for sensor and performance metrics
databases.relational: PostgreSQL for structured data and configurations
databases.cache: Redis for session management and real-time data

Privacy-preserving facial recognition with local processing
GDPR/CCPA compliant data handling and retention

API key management with rate limiting
Audit logging for all system activities
threat_mitigation: Secure container scanning and runtime protection
Encrypted storage and secure key management

Access control systems and alarm panels
Law enforcement databases and watch lists
Building management and IoT sensor networks
data_sources: Social media and news feeds for threat intelligence
Mobile apps for field personnel reporting

Mobile apps for alerts and field operations
